1.0.5.fr: Ajout du support des commandes sans fils pour volet roulant, Ajout du support pour sorties de cable sans fil, optimisation globale de l'application et du système de requêtes
1.0.5.en: Added support for wireless controls for rolling shutters, Added support for wireless cable outputs, global optimization of the application and query system

1.1.1.en: - Added support for energy meters, fixed a problem with roller shutters that didn't move when a command was issued, added an error logger accessible in the app's options (still in beta) and added support for more lights

1.1.2.en: - Added support for energy meters, fixed a problem with roller shutters that didn't move when a command was issued, added an error logger accessible in the app's options (still in beta), added support for more lights and fixed a problem with custom flows
